TEXT.TITLE: LINCOLN FOODSERVICE <LINN> COMPLETES PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Lincoln Foodservice Products Inc said it completed purchasing certain assets of Redco product line of food slicers, cutters and wedgers from the Dean/Alco Food Prep division of <Alco Foodservice Equipment Co.> Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
